help.Simple:
Simple will display the tables and their total number of rows.
Available Options:
 1. --c=connectionName
help.List:
List tables with schema information.
Available Options:
 1. --c=connectionName
 2. --t=tableName or Namepace\Model
help.Monitor:
Display current database server performance status.
 1. --c=connectionName
 2. --i=interval time for refreshing
help.Show:
Display all the available tables in a tabular form.
Available Options:.
 1. --c=connectionName
 2. --t=tableName or Namepace\Model
help.Table:
Display table paginated rows.
Available Options:
 1. --c=connectionName
 2. --t=tableName or Namepace\Model
 3. --p=pageNumber(numeric [default=1])
 4. --l=limitOfRowsPerPage(numeric [default=15])
 5. --o=orderBy (e.g: --o=id:desc or --o=id:asc [default=asc])
 6. --w=widthOfCell(char length in numeric [default = 10])
 7. --s=select columns to display, use comma (,) to separated column names

Note:
 * For all commands you can provide --option=value or -option value
 * --c=connectionName is always optional [default=defaultConnectionName].
